name: Ann Field
biography:
Artist and Graphics Designer.
Born in England.
Graduated from the Brighton College of Art.
c. late 1970's - Freelance Fashion Editor, The London Standard, Mademoiselle, and Italian Vogue.
1982 - Emigrated to the U. S. Began working with the fashion illustrator, Antonio Lopez.
Since c. mid-1980's - Freelance artist. 
Clients include: Levis Jeans for Women, Barney's New York and AMFAR (The American Foundation for Aids Research).
Featured in American Illustration.
